subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=[[헌]], [[선]]|rv=heon, seon|mr=hŏn, sŏn|y=hen, sen|eumhun=[[사람]] [[산]] [[위]][[에]] [[있다|있을]], [[신선]]|ehrv=saram san wie isseul, sinseon|ehmr=saram san wie issŭl, sinsŏn|ehy=salam san wie issul, sinsen}}

# There are people on the top of a mountain. (헌)
# It flies easily. (헌)
# Xian. (선)
# Cent. (선)
# Xian Thought (선)
# It is likely to fly. (선)
# It becomes a Xian. (선)

# {{defn|lang=ko|sort=人03}}
